title: California Firm Recalls Beef and Pork Products  Due to Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan 8, 2015 Unibright Foods Inc., a Bell Gardens, Calif., establishment, is recalling approximately 48,139 pounds of frozen, ready-to-eat sukiyaki beef and gingered pork products that may be contaminated with metal extraneous materials, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS)...
